titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: OBSERVATION YEAR AND MONTH (HEAD CIRCUMFERENCE) - Description

div.p: OBSERVATION YEAR AND MONTH (HEAD CIRCUMFERENCE) is the year and month of the date that the PATIENT's Head Circumference was measured.

For the National Neonatal Data Set - Two Year Neonatal Outcomes Assessment, OBSERVATION YEAR AND MONTH (HEAD CIRCUMFERENCE) is submitted instead of OBSERVATION DATE (HEAD CIRCUMFERENCE), where the data set record is anonymised.
